HEADLINE: Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio: Decoding Crucial Market Insights
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio: Decoding Crucial Market Insights In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, understanding market sentiment is paramount for any trader. While price charts and technical indicators offer valuable clues, delving into the intricacies of derivatives markets, particularly BTC perpetual futures , can provide a deeper look into the collective mindset of traders. One of the most insightful metrics in this regard is the Bitcoin long-short ratio . This ratio acts as a powerful barometer, indicating whether the majority of traders are betting on a price increase (long) or a price decrease (short). Let‚Äôs dive into the latest 24-hour data and unravel what it could mean for the future trajectory of Bitcoin. What Exactly is the Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio? At its core, the Bitcoin long-short ratio is a simple yet profound indicator. It measures the proportion of long positions versus short positions on perpetual futures contracts across various cryptocurrency exchanges. Perpetual futures are a type of derivative that allows traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without an expiration date, making them highly popular in the crypto space. Long Positions: These are bets that the price of Bitcoin will go up. Traders who open long positions profit if Bitcoin‚Äôs value increases. Short Positions: These are bets that the price of Bitcoin will go down. Traders who open short positions profit if Bitcoin‚Äôs value decreases. The Ratio: When the long-short ratio is high (more long positions), it suggests a bullish sentiment among traders. Conversely, a low ratio (more short positions) points towards a bearish outlook. Understanding this ratio provides a snapshot of the prevailing market sentiment, which can often precede significant price movements in the underlying asset, Bitcoin. Why Does the Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio Matter for Traders? For anyone involved in crypto trading, particularly with BTC perpetual futures , the Bitcoin long-short ratio is more than just a statistic; it‚Äôs a window into the collective psychology of the market. Here‚Äôs why it holds significant weight: Gauging Market Sentiment: It directly reflects whether the majority of leveraged traders are feeling bullish or bearish. A strong bias in either direction can signal potential reversals or continuations. Identifying Overbought/Oversold Conditions: Extremely high long ratios might indicate an over-leveraged long market, potentially ripe for a cascade of liquidations if prices drop slightly. Similarly, an overly short market could be poised for a short squeeze. Spotting Divergences: Sometimes, the ratio might diverge from the actual price action. For instance, if Bitcoin‚Äôs price is rising but the long-short ratio is decreasing, it could suggest that the rally lacks conviction from leveraged traders. Complementing Other Indicators: While powerful, the ratio is best used in conjunction with other technical analysis tools and fundamental news to form a comprehensive trading strategy. By monitoring this ratio, traders can gain an edge, anticipating potential shifts in momentum and adjusting their strategies accordingly. The Latest Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio Snapshot: What Are Traders Saying? Let‚Äôs delve into the most recent 24-hour data for BTC perpetual futures across key exchanges. This snapshot provides a clear picture of where the sentiment currently lies among leveraged traders. 24-Hour BTC Perpetual Futures Long-Short Ratios Category/Exchange Long Positions (%) Short Positions (%) Total Market 47.42% 52.58% Binance 45.82% 54.18% Bybit 45.48% 54.52% Gate.io 49.71% 50.29% Interpreting the Numbers: What Does This Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio Tell Us? Looking at the aggregate data, we observe a slight bearish tilt in the overall market sentiment for BTC perpetual futures . text: Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio: Decoding Crucial Market Insights. BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio: Decoding Crucial Market Insights In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, understanding market sentiment is paramount for any trader. While price charts and technical indicators offer valuable clues, delving into the intricacies of derivatives markets, particularly BTC perpetual futures , can provide a deeper look into the collective mindset of traders. One of the most insightful metrics in this regard is the Bitcoin long-short ratio . This ratio acts as a powerful barometer, indicating whether the majority of traders are betting on a price increase (long) or a price decrease (short). Let‚Äôs dive into the latest 24-hour data and unravel what it could mean for the future trajectory of Bitcoin. What Exactly is the Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio? At its core, the Bitcoin long-short ratio is a simple yet profound indicator. It measures the proportion of long positions versus short positions on perpetual futures contracts across various cryptocurrency exchanges. Perpetual futures are a type of derivative that allows traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without an expiration date, making them highly popular in the crypto space. Long Positions: These are bets that the price of Bitcoin will go up. Traders who open long positions profit if Bitcoin‚Äôs value increases. Short Positions: These are bets that the price of Bitcoin will go down. Traders who open short positions profit if Bitcoin‚Äôs value decreases. The Ratio: When the long-short ratio is high (more long positions), it suggests a bullish sentiment among traders. Conversely, a low ratio (more short positions) points towards a bearish outlook. Understanding this ratio provides a snapshot of the prevailing market sentiment, which can often precede significant price movements in the underlying asset, Bitcoin. Why Does the Bitcoin Long-Short Ratio Matter for Traders? For anyone involved in crypto trading, particularly with BTC perpetual futures , the Bitcoin long-short ratio is more than just a statistic; it‚Äôs a window into the collective psychology of the market. Here‚Äôs why it holds significant weight: Gauging Market Sentiment: It directly reflects whether the majority of leveraged traders are feeling bullish or bearish. A strong bias in either direction can signal potential reversals or continuations. Identifying Overbought/Oversold Conditions: Extremely high long ratios might indicate an over-leveraged long market, potentially ripe for a cascade of liquidations if prices drop slightly. Similarly, an overly short market could be poised for a short squeeze. Spotting Divergences: Sometimes, the ratio might diverge from the actual price action. For instance, if Bitcoin‚Äôs price is rising but the long-short ratio is decreasing, it could suggest that the rally lacks conviction from leveraged traders. Complementing Other Indicators: While powerful, the ratio is best used in conjunction with other technical analysis tools and fundamental news to form a comprehensive trading strategy. By monitoring this ratio, traders can gain an edge, anticipating potential shifts in momentum and adjusting their strategies accordingly. With 47.42% long positions and 52.58% short positions, it indicates that a marginally higher proportion of leveraged traders are currently betting on a decline in Bitcoin‚Äôs price. This suggests that a substantial portion of their user base is anticipating a downward price movement. Gate.io: In contrast, Gate.io presents a nearly balanced scenario, with short positions only slightly edging out long positions (50.29% vs. 49.71%). This indicates a more neutral or divided sentiment among traders on this particular platform compared to the others. HEADLINE: Chinese BTC Mining Firm Bitmain Mulls Building First US Facility
SUMMARY: Chinese Bitcoin mining rig manufacturer Bitmain is considering a phased strategy to establish its first US factory soon. The company would also officially set up a new headquarters in either Texas or Florida, Bloomberg reported . In the first phase, Bitmain intends to recruit about 250 local employees for manufacturing and site-level maintenance units. According to Irene Gao, Bitmain‚Äôs global business chief, the company will start its initial output in early 2026 and begin full-scale production later in the year. Gao calls the US a ‚Äúunique opportunity‚Äù at a time when Trump‚Äôs administration is riding towards pro-crypto policies and a ‚ÄúMade in USA‚Äù strategy. The shift is further driven by the US industrial policies, tariffs, and China‚Äôs 2021 mining ban. Last month, Trump‚Äôs family-associated crypto venture raised $220 million to buy Bitcoin and digital asset mining equipment. US Labor Costs Are Higher: Bitmain Gao noted that local production would speed up deliveries and repairs for US customers, while labor costs remain high. ‚ÄúThe move still makes commercial sense,‚Äù she added, especially when there is uncertainty around tariffs. Alternatively, Chinese supply chains are under fire, with Trump‚Äôs trade war disrupting several businesses, including Bitmain‚Äôs US expansion goals. Beijing-based company shipments have been held up at several ports with heightened scrutiny by the Customs department. If established, Bitmain would join America‚Äôs top publicly-listed miners, including Mara Holdings, Riot Platforms and CleanSpart. Additionally, another North American Bitcoin mining giant, Hut8, is already planning a full stock merger with Gryphon Digital Mining, under the American Bitcoin brand. Hut8 purchased 31,145 Bitmain machines to upgrade its mining fleet in November 2024. Chinese Bitcoin Miners Pivot to US Soil During President Joe Biden‚Äôs administration, Chinese Bitcoin miners operating in the US drew security concerns. Last year, Biden ordered a Chinese-backed cryptocurrency mining company to sell land near a Wyoming nuclear missile base, citing national security concerns. Per the University of Cambridge report, three biggest makers of Bitcoin (BTC) mining machines ‚Äî Bitmain, Canaan, and MicroBT, manufacture 99% of the world‚Äôs BTC mining hardware. Further, Cryptonews reported that 65% of Bitcoin mining operations around the world still trace their origins to China. As Trump looks to make the US a global leader in crypto, can he achieve Bitcoin mining hashrate dominance without relying on Chinese tech? #Bitcoin #Mining #DonaldTrump https://t.co/G8Sw2TiyFI ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 2, 2025 Batyr Hydyrov, CEO of crypto mining equipment provider Uminers said that China‚Äôs previous hashrate has moved to countries like Russia and the U.S. As there is a brain drain among Bitcoin miners from China to other nations, particularly the USA, the U.S.‚Äô share of the total Bitcoin mining hashrate, or computing power, surged from 4% in 2019 to the current 38% . The post Chinese BTC Mining Firm Bitmain Mulls Building First US Facility appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: CoinShares Launches Zero-Fee SEI ETP With Staking Yield Across Europe
SUMMARY: Crypto asset manager CoinShares has launched a new exchange-traded product (ETP) that gives investors exposure to Sei (SEI) while eliminating management fees and offering a 2% staking yield. The product, listed under the ticker CSEI, will be traded on the SIX Swiss Exchange. It marks the first regulated investment vehicle offering direct access to SEI, a Layer-1 blockchain designed to support high-speed, low-latency trading infrastructure. CoinShares, which manages over $8 billion in digital assets, said the launch aims to remove hurdles for institutional investors who previously faced complex custody and operational requirements to access SEI. The product is physically backed by SEI tokens and automatically distributes a 2% annualized staking yield to investors. The launch comes shortly after CoinShares became the first European crypto asset manager to receive a Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) license. The ETP is passported across CoinShares‚Äô European market footprint thanks to the company‚Äôs licenses. Various crypto ETPs have been launched in Europe, but these funds‚Äô adoption has lagged far behind that of spot ETFs in the U.S. JustETF data shows a total of 108 products have roughly 13.92 billion euros ($16.21 billion) in assets under management. In comparison, BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT has over $86 billion in net assets. Spot bitcoin (BTC) ETFs, according to SoSoValue , have a total of $151.4 billion in total net assets. Read more: Crypto Asset Manager CoinShares Secures EU-Wide MiCA License

HEADLINE: Bitcoin‚Äôs Rally Might Be Running on Fumes, Analyst Warns of August Turning Point
SUMMARY: Bitcoin‚Äôs price is beginning to recover after a brief period of stagnation, trading at $118,945 at the time of writing. This marks a 1% increase over the past 24 hours, with the asset briefly reaching a high of $119,754 during the same period. The recent upward movement suggests a cautious return of buying interest, though analysts warn that market participants should remain aware of deeper trends influencing price action. Among the key voices weighing in is CryptoQuant contributor Yonsei Dent, who highlighted a familiar pattern in Bitcoin‚Äôs current on-chain metrics. Related Reading: Bitcoin Endures One Of The Most Intense Bear Weeks Of This Bull Cycle ‚Äì Details MVRV Ratio Signals Possible Peak by Late August According to Dent, the 365-day moving average (DMA) of the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) ratio has proven to be a historically useful indicator of market cycle tops. Drawing parallels to 2021, when the MVRV 365DMA formed a double-top pattern followed by the start of a bear market, Dent suggested that Bitcoin could be approaching a similar inflection point. In his analysis titled ‚ÄúMVRV Points to a Potential Cycle Peak ‚Äî Late August May Be the Real Turning Point,‚Äù Dent noted that the structure of the current cycle resembles the double-top formation seen in 2021. He projects that if the same six-month interval is applied, the market could experience a peak by around September 10. However, Dent emphasized that the MVRV ratio is a lagging indicator, and thus a reversal in Bitcoin‚Äôs trend may begin as early as late August. The analyst also linked this potential turning point to broader macroeconomic narratives, such as speculation around Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. While Dent did not predict an exact price top, he urged market participants to treat this period as one that requires heightened attention to risk management. ‚ÄúLet on-chain timing guide your strategy ‚Äî now is the time to tighten risk management and stay nimble,‚Äù he advised. Bitcoin Liquidity Metrics Suggest Potential Saturation In a separate post, CryptoQuant contributor Arab Chain examined the Bitcoin Stablecoin Supply Ratio (SSR) as another tool to evaluate current market strength. The SSR compares Bitcoin‚Äôs market capitalization to that of all stablecoins, offering a window into liquidity dynamics within the crypto ecosystem. Arab Chain explained that stablecoins act as the fiat-equivalent within the market, and their supply levels relative to Bitcoin help measure the purchasing power available to fuel price movements. According to Arab Chain, a rising SSR indicates a lower presence of stablecoins relative to Bitcoin, which could mean that price gains are occurring despite limited liquidity. This scenario suggests that the current upward momentum may be encountering diminishing support from new capital inflows. Related Reading: $4B Increase In Bitcoin Open Interest Fueled By Whale Transfers To Exchanges ‚Äì Details ‚ÄúA continued rise in the indicator may indicate that buying momentum may weaken in the future due to low liquidity,‚Äù he wrote, adding that unless stablecoin reserves grow meaningfully in the coming days, Bitcoin‚Äôs rally could face resistance. Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from TradingView

HEADLINE: US Government Loses $17,000,000 in Just Three Days to ‚ÄòViral‚Äô ATM Glitch Tied to Jobs Youth Program: Report
SUMMARY: An ATM scam tied to a New York City youth employment program reportedly spread on TikTok and caused millions of dollars in losses within days. According to a New York Times report, payment cards provided to participants of NYC‚Äôs Summer Youth Employment Program were suddenly allowing users to take out more money from ATMs than they should have been able to. The payment cards issued to thousands of young people in the program normally give users access only to that week‚Äôs earnings ‚Äì at the most a few hundred dollars. But this time, the payment cards gave users the ability to withdraw tens of thousands of dollars at each ATM. In total, some $17 million was fraudulently withdrawn on the payment cards between July 11th and July 13th. An estimated 30,000 cards were issued to 14- to 24-year-olds who were unable to receive payment by direct deposit. The NYC Police Department‚Äôs Financial Crimes Task Force is now investigating the matter. Anonymous law enforcement officials say some of the program participants sold their cards for $1,000 apiece. Mark Zustovich, a spokesman for the agency that oversees the program, the NYC Department of Youth and Community Development, says participants may have been pressured by criminals to abuse their payment cards. ‚ÄúWe are deeply disturbed by scammers preying on our participants just as they started their work assignments to support themselves and their families.‚Äù It remans unclear at time of writing what made it possible for payment cards to allow for the fraudulent withdrawals and who will ultimately be responsible for covering the costs. HEADLINE: Bitmain U.S. Facility: A Game-Changing Move for Domestic Bitcoin Mining Production
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitmain U.S. Facility: A Game-Changing Move for Domestic Bitcoin Mining Production Imagine a world where the very machines powering the decentralized future of finance are built right in your backyard. This vision is rapidly becoming a reality as Bitmain, a titan in the Bitcoin mining rig manufacturing industry, sets its sights on establishing its inaugural Bitmain U.S. facility . This isn‚Äôt just another factory; it‚Äôs a monumental step that promises to reshape global supply chains, invigorate domestic manufacturing, and fortify the infrastructure of the digital economy. For years, the vast majority of Bitcoin mining hardware has originated from overseas, primarily Asia. While efficient, this concentration has presented vulnerabilities related to supply chain disruptions, geopolitical tensions, and logistics challenges. Bitmain‚Äôs strategic pivot to the United States signals a profound shift, indicating a global recalibration towards localized production and enhanced resilience within the crypto ecosystem. It‚Äôs a move that has the potential to impact everything from job markets to national security, making the U.S. a central player not just in crypto adoption, but in its very creation. The Genesis of the Bitmain U.S. Facility: Why Now? The decision by Bitmain to establish a Bitmain U.S. facility is a reflection of several converging global and economic trends. The past few years have highlighted the fragility of highly centralized supply chains, particularly during events like the pandemic and various geopolitical conflicts. Companies worldwide are seeking to diversify their manufacturing footprints to mitigate risks and ensure continuity of operations. As reported by The Block, citing Bloomberg, Bitmain is actively working to finalize a location in either Texas or Florida by the close of the third quarter of this year. The ambitious timeline projects manufacturing operations to commence as early as 2026. This isn‚Äôt a hasty decision but a calculated move to capitalize on the unique advantages the U.S. offers: Energy Availability and Cost: Certain U.S. states, particularly Texas, boast abundant and relatively inexpensive energy resources, crucial for the energy-intensive process of Bitcoin mining and, by extension, the manufacturing of mining rigs. Political Stability and Regulatory Clarity (Emerging): While crypto regulations are still evolving, the U.S. offers a more predictable legal and political environment compared to some other regions, which can be attractive for long-term investments. Skilled Workforce: The U.S. has a strong pool of engineering, manufacturing, and technical talent, essential for operating a sophisticated production facility. Proximity to Market: Establishing a facility within a significant market like the U.S. reduces shipping times and costs for North American customers, improving efficiency and customer satisfaction. This strategic move is not just about Bitmain; it reflects a broader industry trend towards decentralizing critical infrastructure for the blockchain economy. Unpacking the Strategic Locations: Texas or Florida for the Bitmain U.S. Facility? The choice between Texas and Florida for the new Bitmain U.S. facility is a fascinating one, each state presenting its own compelling set of advantages and considerations. Both have emerged as hotspots for cryptocurrency-related businesses, but for different reasons. Factor Texas Considerations Florida Considerations Energy Infrastructure & Cost Abundant and relatively cheap renewable (wind, solar) and natural gas energy. Deregulated market offers competitive pricing. Existing large-scale mining operations provide an ecosystem. Growing renewable energy sector, but potentially higher base energy costs compared to Texas. Less established large-scale mining ecosystem. Regulatory Environment Generally pro-crypto legislation and business-friendly policies. Active engagement from state lawmakers to attract blockchain businesses. Emerging as a crypto-friendly state with supportive governors and mayors. Focus on innovation and attracting tech businesses. Land & Logistics Vast tracts of affordable land suitable for large industrial facilities. Central U.S. location with strong transportation networks. More developed and potentially denser urban areas. Strategic coastal access for international shipping, but land availability might be more constrained/costly. Talent Pool & Ecosystem Growing tech workforce, especially around Austin and Dallas. Established industrial and manufacturing base. Strong and growing tech talent pool, particularly in South Florida. Attractive lifestyle for talent retention. The final decision will likely hinge on a detailed analysis of operational costs, long-term energy contracts, regulatory certainty, and the ability to scale efficiently. Regardless of the chosen state, the establishment of the Bitmain U.S. facility will undoubtedly inject significant economic activity into the local economy. What Benefi

This isn‚Äôt a hasty decision but a calculated move to capitalize on the unique advantages the U.S. offers: Energy Availability and Cost: Certain U.S. states, particularly Texas, boast abundant and relatively inexpensive energy resources, crucial for the energy-intensive process of Bitcoin mining and, by extension, the manufacturing of mining rigs. Political Stability and Regulatory Clarity (Emerging): While crypto regulations are still evolving, the U.S. offers a more predictable legal and political environment compared to some other regions, which can be attractive for long-term investments. Skilled Workforce: The U.S. has a strong pool of engineering, manufacturing, and technical talent, essential for operating a sophisticated production facility. Proximity to Market: Establishing a facility within a significant market like the U.S. reduces shipping times and costs for North American customers, improving efficiency and customer satisfaction. This strategic move is not just about Bitmain; it reflects a broader industry trend towards decentralizing critical infrastructure for the blockchain economy. Unpacking the Strategic Locations: Texas or Florida for the Bitmain U.S. Facility? The choice between Texas and Florida for the new Bitmain U.S. facility is a fascinating one, each state presenting its own compelling set of advantages and considerations. Both have emerged as hotspots for cryptocurrency-related businesses, but for different reasons. Factor Texas Considerations Florida Considerations Energy Infrastructure & Cost Abundant and relatively cheap renewable (wind, solar) and natural gas energy. Deregulated market offers competitive pricing. Existing large-scale mining operations provide an ecosystem. Growing renewable energy sector, but potentially higher base energy costs compared to Texas. Less established large-scale mining ecosystem. Regulatory Environment Generally pro-crypto legislation and business-friendly policies. Active engagement from state lawmakers to attract blockchain businesses. Emerging as a crypto-friendly state with supportive governors and mayors. Focus on innovation and attracting tech businesses. Land & Logistics Vast tracts of affordable land suitable for large industrial facilities. Central U.S. location with strong transportation networks. More developed and potentially denser urban areas. Strategic coastal access for international shipping, but land availability might be more constrained/costly. Talent Pool & Ecosystem Growing tech workforce, especially around Austin and Dallas. Established industrial and manufacturing base. Strong and growing tech talent pool, particularly in South Florida. Attractive lifestyle for talent retention. The final decision will likely hinge on a detailed analysis of operational costs, long-term energy contracts, regulatory certainty, and the ability to scale efficiently. Regardless of the chosen state, the establishment of the Bitmain U.S. facility will undoubtedly inject significant economic activity into the local economy. What Benefi

HEADLINE: Massive Bitcoin Transfer: Unveiling a $238M Whale Alert
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Massive Bitcoin Transfer: Unveiling a $238M Whale Alert In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where fortunes can shift in the blink of an eye, certain events grab immediate attention. Recently, the crypto community buzzed with news of a significant on-chain event: a massive Bitcoin transfer . According to Whale Alert, a prominent blockchain tracking service, a staggering 2,000 BTC, valued at approximately $238 million at the time of the transaction, moved from a Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) address to an unknown wallet. This isn‚Äôt just another transaction; it‚Äôs a colossal movement that sparks questions and speculation across the digital asset landscape. What does such a large Bitcoin transfer signify, and what are its potential implications for the broader market? What Exactly Happened with This Massive Bitcoin Transfer? The core of the news is straightforward yet profound. On a recent day, Whale Alert, known for its real-time tracking of large crypto movements, flagged a particular transaction that immediately sent ripples through the crypto community. This automated service continuously monitors blockchain activity, alerting users to unusually large transfers that could indicate significant shifts in market dynamics. In this instance, the alert detailed the movement of a substantial amount of Bitcoin: Asset Transferred: 2,000 BTC Approximate Fiat Value: $238,000,000 (based on Bitcoin‚Äôs price at the time of transfer) Origin Address: Identified as a Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) wallet Destination Address: An ‚Äòunknown wallet‚Äô ‚Äì meaning an address not publicly associated with an exchange, known institution, or individual. This particular Bitcoin transfer is noteworthy not just for its immense value but also for its origin. Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) is an ERC-20 token that represents Bitcoin on the Ethereum blockchain, allowing BTC holders to participate in Ethereum‚Äôs vibrant decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. The movement of such a substantial amount from a WBTC address implies a shift away from a DeFi-centric environment, or perhaps a consolidation, raising immediate questions about the whale‚Äôs intentions. Was it a strategic move to exit a DeFi position, a preparation for an over-the-counter (OTC) deal, or something else entirely? The transparency of the blockchain reveals the ‚Äòwhat,‚Äô but the ‚Äòwhy‚Äô often remains a captivating mystery. Why Does a 2,000 BTC Transfer Matter to the Crypto World? In the cryptocurrency market, large transactions, often referred to as ‚Äòwhale movements,‚Äô are closely watched indicators. Whales are individuals or entities holding significant amounts of crypto, and their actions can have a ripple effect across the entire ecosystem. A Bitcoin transfer of this magnitude matters for several compelling reasons: Market Sentiment Influence: Such large movements can significantly influence investor sentiment. If the market perceives a whale is preparing to sell a large sum, it might trigger fear and a downward price movement. Conversely, if it‚Äôs seen as a move to secure funds for long-term holding or an OTC deal, it could be neutral or even perceived as a positive signal for future demand. Potential for Volatility: While this particular transfer was to an ‚Äòunknown wallet‚Äô and not directly to an exchange, the possibility always exists that these funds could eventually be moved to an exchange. Such a move could significantly impact market liquidity and potentially trigger price fluctuations, either upwards if bought or downwards if sold. Insight into Whale Behavior: Tracking these transfers provides invaluable clues about the strategies of major holders. Are they accumulating more assets, distributing their holdings, or simply rebalancing their vast portfolios? These insights can help analysts identify broader market trends. Network Activity and Health: The execution of such a massive Bitcoin transfer highlights the continued utility, security, and robust activity on both the Bitcoin and Ethereum blockchains. It demonstrates the underlying infrastructure‚Äôs capacity to handle colossal value transfers efficiently and securely. These large transactions act as a pulse check for the market, offering glimpses into the actions of its most influential participants and shaping narratives around Bitcoin‚Äôs immediate future. Demystifying Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) in Large Bitcoin Transfers To fully grasp the significance of this Bitcoin transfer , it‚Äôs crucial to understand Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) and its role in the broader crypto landscape. WBTC bridges the gap between Bitcoin‚Äôs robust security and Ethereum‚Äôs expansive decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. Essentially, it allows Bitcoin holders to participate in Ethereum-based applications without having to sell their native BTC. Here‚Äôs a quick overview of how WBTC functions: Feature Description ERC-20 Token Standard WBTC is an Ethereum-based token, making it fully compatible with all Ethereum wallets, decentralized applications (dApps), and smart con

HEADLINE: Has a Correction Signal Appeared in Bitcoin and Altcoins? Singapore-based Analysis Company Examined and Explained Options
SUMMARY: Cryptocurrency analysis firm QCP Capital has published a comprehensive market assessment for Ethereum (ETH) and Bitcoin (BTC) following the recent market volatility. The report particularly highlighted Ethereum''s rising momentum and its superior performance in spot ETF inflows. According to QCP Capital, Ethereum is on a remarkable rally, approaching the $4,000 level for the first time since December 2023. Spot ETF inflows into ETH have outpaced Bitcoin ETF inflows over the past seven days, suggesting growing institutional interest in the Ethereum narrative. The company stated that Ethereum''s market capitalization is still around one-fifth of Bitcoin''s, adding, ‚ÄúIt takes much less institutional or treasury capital to move the price of ETH compared to BTC.‚Äù In recent weeks, while ETH has dominated the news, Bitcoin has demonstrated quiet resilience. Despite a slowdown in spot BTC ETF inflows, prices have held firm. The 80,000 BTC sold by a long-term investor last Friday was absorbed without causing significant market panic. The sudden surge in volatility quickly reversed. According to the analytics firm, BTC dominance remained stable at around 60%, indicating that investors continue to view Bitcoin as a store of value. QCP Capital noted that this isn''t a complete shift towards altcoins, but that ETH and other major projects still have room to increase their market share. As you may recall, at ETH''s peak in November 2021, BTC dominance had fallen below 45%, while ETH''s was approaching 20%. Related News: BREAKING: SEC Updates Two Cryptocurrency Spot ETF Applications - One Linked to Trump According to the report, the market is showing signs of oversold positioning in the short term. Open interest in perpetual futures is approaching year-highs of $45 billion for BTC and $28 billion for ETH. At the same time, funding rates on major exchanges have risen above 15%. QCP Capital stated that these levels haven''t yet signaled a major correction, but even a small trigger could trigger a chain reaction sell-off similar to last Friday. Indeed, some large investors took profits by closing their 3.6k/4k/4.2k ETH Call Fly positions due September 26, 2025. Meanwhile, there was strong demand for $110,000 BTC Put options due August 8, 2025, indicating a search for protection against near-term risks. Profit-taking is expected around $4,000 for ETH and $120,000 for BTC in the coming days. However, QCP Capital predicts that, given the current momentum, strong trends, and supporting macroeconomic factors, the market will continue to buy on pullbacks. The rapid recovery observed after Friday''s decline, in particular, suggests that institutional investors are continuing their ‚Äúbuy the dip‚Äù strategy. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Has a Correction Signal Appeared in Bitcoin and Altcoins? Singapore-based Analysis Company Examined and Explained Options

HEADLINE: Fed Likely to Hold Rates, September Cut Could Boost Crypto

Forward guidance may hint at a possible rate cut in September. Such a move could boost risk assets including Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies by increasing liquidity and investor confidence. Market participants are watching closely as easing monetary policy expectations tend to support crypto market rallies despite ongoing macroeconomic uncertainties.

HEADLINE: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll Accumulate More Ethereum Than Any Project,‚Äù Says Joe Lubin
SUMMARY: The post ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll Accumulate More Ethereum Than Any Project,‚Äù Says Joe Lubin appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In May, Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin quietly took the reins as chairman of SharpLink Gaming, a NASDAQ-listed company that pivoted from sports betting to building an Ethereum-focused treasury. At first glance, it seemed like a niche shift. But now, the bigger picture is becoming clear: Ethereum is entering a new institutional chapter , and Lubin is at the forefront. ETH‚Äôs Utility Meets Real-World Demand Speaking with Bloomberg , Lubin said the long-awaited moment for Ethereum has arrived. For years, Bitcoin dominated the narrative as a digital store of value, while Ethereum was viewed as a platform with potential. But now, thanks to staking, programmability, and growing regulatory clarity, Ethereum is becoming a critical part of real-world financial strategies. Institutions are no longer just exploring Ethereum, they‚Äôre integrating it. Lubin emphasized that Ethereum offers more than just value storage; it‚Äôs an engine for programmable finance and decentralized infrastructure. ‚ÄúWe believe that we‚Äôll be able to accumulate more Ether per fully diluted share much faster than any other Ethereum-based project, or certainly faster than the Bitcoin-based projects,‚Äù Lubin told Bloomberg Television on Monday . Companies Are Building Ethereum Treasuries A clear sign of this shift is how companies are holding and using ETH. SharpLink Gaming now holds over 360,000 ETH, worth more than $1.3 billion, as part of its core treasury strategy. Inspired by this, BitMine Immersion, a former Bitcoin mining firm, pivoted to Ethereum and amassed 566,776 ETH worth over $2.1 billion in just a few weeks. The results were immediate: both companies saw a stock surge, and Ethereum‚Äôs price climbed past $3,600 in July after dipping to $1,450 in April. These companies aren‚Äôt just holding ETH, they‚Äôre staking it. That means their holdings are generating passive income and actively supporting the network, making Ethereum a productive, yield-bearing asset in a way Bitcoin is not. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Crypto Bull Run Faces Reality Check as 10x Research Warns of Market Slowdown , Vitalik Buterin: Building for the Long Term While Lubin steers Ethereum into corporate treasuries, Vitalik Buterin continues shaping the protocol‚Äôs technical roadmap . He remains focused on scalability, decentralization, and mass adoption through upgrades like rollups and data sharding. Although the recent Decun upgrade reduced ETH‚Äôs burn rate, slightly impacting its scarcity appeal, Buterin remains confident in Ethereum‚Äôs ability to support DeFi and broader real-world applications. A New Narrative for Ethereum With over $3.2 billion in ETH now held by public companies, Ethereum is entering a new chapter. It‚Äôs no longer just a speculative asset or a platform for developers. It‚Äôs becoming a central pillar in institutional portfolios and business models. Lubin and Buterin are playing different but complementary roles, one pushing Ethereum into boardrooms, the other strengthening its foundation. Together, they‚Äôre shaping a new, more powerful narrative for Ethereum: not just as ‚Äúdigital oil,‚Äù but as the infrastructure for the future of finance. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_regist

HEADLINE: Top Crypto Under $1 to Buy Now Before the Next Bitcoin (BTC) Price Boom
SUMMARY: The clock is ticking, and July‚Äôs crypto window won‚Äôt stay open for long. With Bitcoin (BTC) primed for another price boom, savvy traders are scanning the market for the top crypto under $1 to buy now. Leading the buzz this summer is Mutuum Finance (MUTM) , a fast-rising DeFi powerhouse sparking serious FOMO as forecasts of its breakout potential spread across the community. HEADLINE: Bitcoin Correction: Unpacking the Alarming Dip as U.S. Demand Wanes
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Correction: Unpacking the Alarming Dip as U.S. Demand Wanes The cryptocurrency market is an ever-evolving landscape, often characterized by rapid shifts and unexpected turns. Currently, the buzz among traders and analysts revolves around a potential extended Bitcoin correction . What exactly is fueling this growing concern, and how might it impact your crypto portfolio? Recent data points to a significant shift in U.S. investor behavior, suggesting that the current market downturn might persist longer than some anticipate. What‚Äôs Driving the Current Bitcoin Correction? At the heart of the recent market unease is a key metric known as the 60-day BTC premium. This indicator, as reported by CoinDesk, measures the price difference between Bitcoin (BTC) traded on Coinbase, a popular U.S.-based exchange, and Binance, a global exchange. Historically, a positive premium on Coinbase has indicated strong buying pressure from U.S. investors, often signaling bullish sentiment. However, for the first time since late May, this 60-day BTC premium has turned negative. What does a negative premium signify? It suggests that U.S. investors are either selling more Bitcoin than they are buying, or their buying interest has significantly diminished compared to global markets. This reduced buying pressure from a traditionally dominant market participant like the U.S. can have profound implications for Bitcoin‚Äôs price trajectory. To better understand the implications, consider the following: Positive Premium: Coinbase price is higher than Binance. Indicates strong U.S. demand, often leading to price rallies. Negative Premium: Coinbase price is lower than Binance. Suggests weaker U.S. demand, potentially signaling further price declines or a prolonged Bitcoin correction . Zero Premium: Prices are roughly equal. Indicates balanced demand between the U.S. and global markets. The shift to a negative premium is a clear signal that a significant source of demand is currently on the sidelines or actively taking profits, contributing directly to the ongoing Bitcoin correction . Why is U.S. Investor Demand Crucial for Bitcoin‚Äôs Health? The United States plays an undeniable role in the global cryptocurrency market. Its influence stems from several factors, including a large and sophisticated investor base, significant institutional adoption, and the presence of major crypto companies and regulatory frameworks. Here‚Äôs why U.S. investor sentiment is so pivotal: Institutional Clout: The U.S. is home to numerous institutional investors, hedge funds, and publicly traded companies that have embraced Bitcoin. Their large-scale buying or selling can move markets dramatically. When these big players reduce their exposure or halt new investments, it creates a substantial vacuum in demand. Retail Participation: Millions of individual U.S. investors actively participate in the crypto market. While individual trades might be small, their collective action can significantly impact market dynamics. A decline in retail interest or an increase in profit-taking can amplify downward trends. Regulatory Influence: U.S. regulatory developments often set precedents for other nations. Uncertainty or stricter stances from U.S. regulators can deter investment, not just domestically but globally, affecting overall market sentiment and contributing to a Bitcoin correction . Access to Capital: U.S. markets provide deep liquidity and access to capital, making them attractive for large-volume trades. A slowdown in this liquidity can lead to less efficient price discovery and increased volatility. Therefore, when U.S. investor demand weakens, it‚Äôs not just a domestic issue; it sends ripples across the entire global crypto ecosystem, making a sustained Bitcoin correction a more likely scenario. Has This Bitcoin Correction Happened Before? Lessons from History For seasoned crypto enthusiasts, market corrections are a familiar, albeit often painful, part of the journey. Bitcoin has a history of dramatic price swings, including significant pullbacks that have tested investor resolve. Understanding these past cycles can provide valuable perspective on the current Bitcoin correction . Consider these historical patterns: 2017-2018 Bear Market: Following its parabolic rise to nearly $20,000, Bitcoin entered a prolonged bear market, shedding over 80% of its value. This period saw a significant drop in retail enthusiasm and a re-evaluation of the market. 2021-2022 Correction: After hitting all-time highs above $69,000, Bitcoin experienced another substantial downturn, driven by macroeconomic concerns, regulatory crackdowns, and a general deleveraging in the crypto space. Shifts in Dominant Demand: Historically, periods of strong Asian market demand have sometimes counterbalanced Western market weakness, and vice-versa. The current situation, where U.S. demand is specifically highlighted as weakening, suggests a significant shift in a primary demand driver. Thes
TAGS: Crypto News|BITCOIN|BTC Premium|Crypto Market|investor sentiment|Market Analysis

SUMMARY: Bithumb, one of South Korea''s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, announced that it will list Chainbase Token (C) at Korean won (KRW) trading parity. Bithumb Lists Chainbase Token (C) on Korean Won (KRW) Market The trading start date for the new trading pair is set as 17:00 on Tuesday, July 29, 2025. Transaction Details: Trading Pair: KRW Supported Network: BASE network (Investments from other networks will not be supported) Deposit/Withdrawal Opening Time: Within 3‚Äì4 hours from the announcement Transaction Start Time: 29.07.2025 ‚Äì 17:00 Starting Price: 526 KRW Deposit Confirmation Count: 200 blocks What is Chainbase Token (C)? Chainbase Token is designed as an omni-chain data network that integrates blockchain data. Developed to meet the needs of the artificial intelligence era, this system aims to provide open and transparent data interoperability. The technical infrastructure of the token: High processing capacity, Low latency, Quick finality, Double chain architecture, Elements such as the double stake-based security system stand out. Chainbase Token can be used in a variety of areas, including wallet management, security analysis, AI data utilization, social platform integration, and infrastructure services. The project aims to improve the user experience by making blockchain data more accessible and useful. With this listing, Bithumb aims to contribute to Chainbase''s ecosystem expansion while offering its users the opportunity to invest in next-generation data-driven tokens. *This is not investment advice. HEADLINE: Ethereum ETFs Just Bought 7x More ETH Than Was Issued on ‚ÄòSlow Day‚Äô
SUMMARY: Spot Ether exchange-traded funds in the United States bought seven times more ETH than the network produced on Monday. The total aggregate inflow, while lower than previous days, was $65.2 million, or 17,549 ETH. This is the lowest for three weeks, yet still higher than the daily production figure of 2,571 ETH, or around $9.7 million. ‚ÄúEven on slow days, the ETH ETFs are gobbling up all of the supply,‚Äù said industry educator Anthony Sassano. Net new ETH issuance today: ~2,571 ETH ($9.7 million). Net inflows into the ETH ETFs today: ~17,549 ETH ($65.77 million). The ETH ETFs bought 7x more ETH than was net issued by the network today. Even on slow days, the ETH ETFs are gobbling up all of the supply. Accelerate! ‚Äî sassal.eth/acc (@sassal0x) July 29, 2025 $5 Billion Infows in 17 Days BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Ethereum Trust ( ETHA ) had another three-figure inflow day with $132 million, but that was offset by Fidelity‚Äôs FETH fund outflowing $49.2 million, according to Farside Investors. ETF analyst Eric Balchunas reported that ETHA was the 17th most traded ETF today, in the top 0.4% of all ETFs, ‚Äúfirst time I recall seeing it in there,‚Äù he said. Spot Ethereum ETFs have not seen an outflow day since July 2, almost a month ago. Moreover, they have seen a whopping $3.8 billion in inflows over the past ten trading days. The inflow streak is now 17 days with almost $5.2 billion in new capital, and the record streak was 19 days from May to June, though only $1.4 billion in inflows, observed industry expert Nate Geraci. Ethereum issuance is currently inflationary, but only at 0.12% per year. Comparatively, Bitcoin issuance is 1.34% per year, but both assets are being accumulated at faster rates by ETPs and corporations. Over the past week, the ETH supply has increased by around 17,910 ETH, according to Ultrasound.money. However, spot ETFs consumed almost all of that in one slow day on Monday. Where to Next For ETH? The asset has retreated slightly over the past 24 hours but was still trading around a multi-month high of $3,800 at the time of writing. Position trader Bob Loukas said it ‚Äústill feels like juice in the tank,‚Äù predicting a move to $4,700 in the short term, ‚Äúif we get the BTC move over next four weeks.‚Äù Additionally, August is usually a bullish month for Ethereum during post-Bitcoin halving bull market years, with big gains in 2017 and 2021. If ETH repeats its performance from August 2021, it could surge above $5,000 next month from current levels. August is usually a bullish month for Ethereum during post-halving years! Send $ETH to $10,000. pic.twitter.com/aTZsVfE3KD ‚Äî CryptoGoos (@crypto_goos) July 28, 2025 The post Ethereum ETFs Just Bought 7x More ETH Than Was Issued on ‚ÄòSlow Day‚Äô appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: BitMine‚Äôs Bold Etherum $60K Call Fails To Offset Stock Slide ‚Äì Det
SUMMARY: BitMine Immersion Technologies stock took a sharp hit on Monday, falling over 25% despite a fresh round of bullish messaging from Tom Lee of FundStrat. Investors seemed unconvinced by the plan to make BitMine a major holder and staker of Ethereum. The dip came after shares slid over 10% during regular hours to $35, then dropped another 15% in after‚Äëhours trading. BitMine Shares Plunge Despite Big Claims According to FundStrat‚Äôs Tom Lee, BitMine plans to hold 5% of Ethereum‚Äôs total supply and become a ‚Äúmade in America validator network.‚Äù He highlighted that BitMine already has 600,000 ETH on its balance sheet‚Äîworth more than $2 billion at current prices. Lee even floated the idea that Ether could reach an implied valuation of $60,000, citing unnamed research firms. But those bold figures failed to calm the market. 10/18We asked several research firms to give us ‚Äúreplacement‚Äù value (of Wall Street) to value ETH ‚Äì this is for illustrative purposes only‚Äì implied value for ETH is $60,000‚Äì ETH currently ~$3,800 pic.twitter.com/mXa5uCZukv ‚Äî Bitmine BMNR (@BitMNR) July 28, 2025 Analysts had pointed out that BitMine‚Äôs stock had wildly surged earlier this month. The price shot up more than 3,000% to a yearly high of $135 on July‚ÄØ3 after the initial announcement of the Ether‚Äëbuying strategy. That rally was met with a wave of profit‚Äëtaking once the plan was fully laid out. Many traders sold into the strength, and the mood shifted quickly when shareholders saw the fine print. Investors Question Execution Risks Based on reports from Kronos Research, treasury rollouts on this scale require a solid plan to protect capital and maintain liquidity. Vincent Liu, Kronos‚Äôs chief investment officer, warned that without clear steps for custody and staking infrastructure, holding large amounts of Ether could create big swings in value. And those swings spooked some investors when Lee‚Äôs ‚Äúchairman‚Äôs message‚Äù failed to pin down exact timelines or reveal audit partners. On top of that, the implied $60,000 target for Ether came from sources that remain unnamed. That lack of transparency set off alarm bells. Investors want to know who did the math and whether the data holds up under scrutiny. When price targets are presented without clear attribution, doubt grows fast. Corporate Ether Bets On The Rise Meanwhile, other firms are also loading up on Ether. SharpLink Gaming controls 438,000 ETH. Bit Digital holds over 100,000 ETH. Blockchain Technology Consensus Solutions recently boosted its stake to 29,122 ETH after raising $62‚ÄØmillion. Finality Capital‚Äôs partner David Grider compared the trend to Strategy‚Äôs big bet on Bitcoin‚Äîsaying these moves should help ETH flows and price action. Finality Capital, he disclosed, holds a position in BitMine itself. Featured image from Meta, chart from TradingView

On top of that, the implied $60,000 target for Ether came from sources that remain unnamed. That lack of transparency set off alarm bells. Investors want to know who did the math and whether the data holds up under scrutiny. When price targets are presented without clear attribution, doubt grows fast. Corporate Ether Bets On The Rise Meanwhile, other firms are also loading up on Ether. SharpLink Gaming controls 438,000 ETH. Bit Digital holds over 100,000 ETH. Blockchain Technology Consensus Solutions recently boosted its stake to 29,122 ETH after raising $62‚ÄØmillion. Finality Capital‚Äôs partner David Grider compared the trend to Strategy‚Äôs big bet on Bitcoin‚Äîsaying these moves should help ETH flows and price action. Finality Capital, he disclosed, holds a position in BitMine itself. Featured image from Meta, chart from TradingView

HEADLINE: Binance introduces ‚ÄòDiscount Buy‚Äô for below-market crypto purchases or earn rewards
SUMMARY: Binance has launched Discount Buy, a structured product that allows users to set target prices below current market rates for future crypto purchases or earn fixed APR rewards if the purchase isn‚Äôt executed, according to the information shared with Finbold on July 29. The product provides users with a way to accumulate crypto assets, such as BTC , ETH , BNB , or SOL , in low-volatility markets without the need for constant price monitoring. ‚ÄúDiscount Buy is well-suited for users who anticipate limited price fluctuations and want to accumulate crypto at a discount without needing to time the market or monitor prices closely,‚Äù said Jeff Li, VP of Product at Binance. ‚ÄúIt offers flexibility across investment scenarios, giving users more choices and opportunities in how they want to participate in the crypto market.‚Äù Buy crypto, split funds, or earn fixed rewards Users can sign up to Discount Buy using stablecoins like USDC or USDT, selecting fixed-term products with preset conditions including a Target Buy Price, Knockout Price, fixed APR, and Settlement Date. The Settlement Price is calculated as the average market price over a 30-minute window on the settlement date. The product offers three potential outcomes based on how market prices compare to set levels: 100% principal used for crypto purchase if settlement price meets target, 50% purchase with 50% returned in stablecoins if price falls between target and knockout levels, or full principal returned with APR rewards if price exceeds knockout level. Binance Earn explained. Source: Binance Once subscribed, all terms, including purchase price, knockout price, duration, and APR, are fixed and cannot be modified. Funds remain locked until the settlement date, with no early redemption option available. No trading fees apply when purchases are executed. Binance is offering a launch promotion where eligible users who subscribe between July 29 and August 11, 2025, will receive an additional 10% discount for successful crypto purchases through Discount Buy. For terms and conditions, visit Binance here . Featured image via Shutterstock. The post Binance introduces ‚ÄòDiscount Buy‚Äô for below-market crypto purchases or earn rewards appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: D2X Raises $5M to Expand Crypto Derivatives Exchange for Institutions
SUMMARY: D2X, an Amsterdam-based crypto derivatives exchange designed for institutional investors, has raised 4.3 million euro ($5 million) in a strategic funding round. Circle Ventures, CMT Digital and Canton Ventures joined the raise as strategic investors, alongside the renewed backing of Point72 Ventures, Tioga Capital, GSR, and Fortino Capital. Licensed under the EU‚Äôs MiFID II framework as a Multilateral Trading Facility (MTF), D2X claims to be the first regulated crypto derivatives exchange in a Tier-1 jurisdiction operating seven days a week. The firm recently launched USD-denominated bitcoin (BTC) and ether (ETH) futures, with options on both assets expected soon. The crypto derivatives space is heating up with large exchanges like Coinbase and Kraken acquiring derivatives platforms , and a steady stream of new offerings coming to market. CMT Digital‚Äôs Charlie Sandor said the firm invested in D2X because it bridges a key gap for institutions: a lack of regulatory clarity and infrastructure that operates on weekends. ‚ÄúD2X sets a new benchmark for crypto derivatives in Europe,‚Äù Sandor said. The firm‚Äôs collateral is held off-exchange in partnership with banks, a feature that caters to risk-averse investors wary of centralized custody.

HEADLINE: Analyst Says The Patient Will Be Rewarded As Ethereum Price Retests 4-Year Resistance
SUMMARY: Despite what is akin to a bull market with the Bitcoin price hitting multiple new all-time highs, the Ethereum price continues to hit major resistances in its campaign for new highs. The most recent is the resistance push at the $3,800, which perfectly aligns with the 4-year resistance line that has kept the leading altcoin by market cap from hitting new all-time highs. However, as Ethereum once again gears up for a retest, this time could be the chart that signals the breakout. Ethereum On The Verge Of Breakout Crypto analyst MMCrypto highlighted a possible breakout on the Ethereum price chart after the altcoin moved back toward a 4-year resistance trendline. This trendline had begun back in 2021 when the Ethereum price had hit its $4,800 all-time high, and since then, it has become the resistant trendline to beat for the ETH price to rally to new highs. Related Reading: Dormant Whale Sells $80,000 BTC, But Bitcoin Bulls Still In Control Over the last four years, this resistance trendline has held firmly, beating the Ethereum price back down from the $4,000 level. This has prevented a rally toward its $4,800 and made the $5,000 expected target push even farther away. But now, there could be another opportunity for Ethereum to turn the tide and break this resistance once and for all. Currently, the ETH price is still trending below $4,000, suggesting that the bears are still holding the resistance line. With the price trading below this resistance, MMCrypto points out that ETH has now been underperforming for four years. Given this, a large number of investors have lost money on their investments or haven‚Äôt seen a profit. The major target now is for the resistance to be broken. The crypto analyst explains that once this happens, then the Ethereum price could see a monumental pump from here. This pump, he explains, will be fueled by investors who have yet to realize any profit on their ETH holdings over the last four years. Related Reading: XRP Bullish Cross Playing Out Again: $9 Or $24 Next? With the expectation that the resistance trendline will be broken, the analyst urges investors to be patient. He points out that once the pump begins, those who were patient will be the ones to reap the profits of this ETH price action. Additionally, Ethereum will not be the only altcoin to benefit from a pump. Previous altcoin seasons have been sparked by movements in the Ethereum price, and if ETH is able to break toward a new all-time high, then the altcoin market is expected to follow suit. ‚ÄúThe Ethereum Pump if & when it happens, will have a broad influence on the whole Crypto Space & take many Altcoins with it! Be ready, be prepared,‚Äù the analyst said in closing. Featured image from Dall.E, chart from TradingView.com

HEADLINE: Best crypto to buy now ahead of the Fed meet
SUMMARY: Bitcoin hovered around $119,000 on Tuesday, with traders largely sidelined as they await clearer signals on US trade policy and the Federal Reserve‚Äôs upcoming rate decision. After surging to an all-time high above $123,000 earlier in July, the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency has remained rangebound, showing little momentum in either direction. The subdued price action reflects broader market caution as investors digest the potential impact of renewed global trade tensions and the Fed‚Äôs next move on interest rates. With the central bank widely expected to hold rates steady later this week, focus will turn to Chair Jerome Powell‚Äôs guidance on inflation and future policy shifts. However, in this cautious environment, Bitcoin Penguins (BPENGU), a meme-inspired token, has raised over $1 million within a day of its presale launch, signalling a shift in investor appetite amid a lull in major crypto price action. The Fed meeting Ahead of the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting on July 29‚Äì30, US President Donald Trump has renewed his calls for lower interest rates, but the Federal Reserve appears poised to hold firm. According to CME FedWatch data, there is a 96.9% probability that the Fed will keep its benchmark rate unchanged‚Äîbetween 4.25% and 4.5%‚Äîmarking the fifth consecutive meeting in 2025 without a cut. The central bank has maintained this range since January, defying repeated presidential pressure to ease monetary policy amid strong economic performance. Chair Jerome Powell and the Committee have consistently signalled a preference to wait and assess the broader effects of existing economic policies, including the Trump administration‚Äôs tariffs, before adjusting rates. Despite Trump‚Äôs visit to the Fed last week, where he again urged cuts citing the ‚Äúbooming‚Äù US economy, policymakers have so far resisted. Markets will watch closely for any change in tone from Powell following the July meeting, especially as inflation trends and trade-related uncertainty continue to shape the Fed‚Äôs path forward. The best crypto to buy now has raised over $1 million The presale for Bitcoin Penguins (BPENGU) brings rare structure and urgency to an early-stage token offering, combining a fixed timeline, transparent pricing model, and clear path to listing‚Äîat a time when open-ended presales have begun to wear thin on investors. Split across 15 stages, the crypto presale increases BPENGU‚Äôs price by 5% at each step, leading to a cumulative rise of 75% from Stage 1 to Stage 15. Early entrants stand to capture notional gains of over 75% by the time the token lists. So far, the presale has raised over $1 million, with the next price jump scheduled within the next 25 hours. The escalating price structure is designed to reward early participation and drive sustained momentum‚Äîan intentional contrast to the prolonged, often delayed presales that have tested investor patience. The presale is capped at 30 days, ending August 27 or sooner if the $10 million hard cap is met. A claim and listing date of September 2 has already been confirmed, giving investors the rare advantage of knowing the token‚Äôs public timeline from the outset. That clarity has struck a chord with buyers seeking transparency and timely execution. With its Bitcoin integration, meme-powered branding, and strong early demand, BPENGU is shaping up as a serious contender in the current altcoin rotation‚Äîand possibly the next meme project to break into the mainstream. HEADLINE: Bernstein says Ethereum treasuries face liquidity risks
SUMMARY: Equity research and brokerage firm Bernstein revealed that Ethereum treasuries are generating more on the digital asset than their Bitcoin-focused counterparts. According to the report, the treasuries are generating staking rewards in addition to holding the virtual asset as a reserve asset. On Monday, the analyst wrote in a note that Ethereum treasuries are facing challenges such as liquidity constraints and smart contract risks that differ from Bitcoin treasury models. The company argued that Ethereum‚Äôs proof-of-stake mechanism allows the firms to stake assets for yield, but Bitcoin‚Äôs proof-of-work structure allows entities to hold BTC without staking. Ethereum Treasuries emerge as next evolution of Strategy‚Äôs playbook Bernstein noted that Ethereum treasuries are also attempting to address limitations on how they deploy capital. According to the report, the treasuries‚Äô staking contracts are liquid, but often wait for days in the queue to unstake. The analyst argued that ETH treasuries need to balance Ethereum liquidity and yield optimization as they stake the digital asset for yield. The brokerage firm added that yield optimization techniques such as the Eigenlayer staking model and DeFi-based yield generation require smart contract security risk management. ‚ÄúThe ETH treasury model has the benefit of actual cash flow yield driving operating earnings, however liquidity risk and security would be important considerations.‚Äù -Bernstein. The report also noted that companies, including SharpLing Gaming (SBET), Bit Digital (BTBT), and BitMine Immersion (BMNR), are focusing on building Ethereum treasuries. According to Bernstein, the trio had accumulated around 876,000 ETH in July, which accounts for 0.9% of the total supply. BMNR revealed last week that it surpassed $2 billion in its ETH holdings. The firm also announced that it‚Äôs aiming to hold and stake around 5% of the total Ethereum supply. Bernstein believes that the growth of the digital dollar and tokenized assets will drive higher user growth in the Ethereum ecosystem. The firm argued that ETH‚Äôs transaction volume on layer-2 chains, operated by platforms like Coinbase and Robinhood, will help Ethereum accrue value from the growth of the asset‚Äôs financial economy. At the time of publication, the digital currency is currently exchanging hands for around $3,809, a 56.42% rise in the last 30 days. BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes has predicted that ETH will surpass its previous record high of $4,800 this year and reach $10,000 by the end of 2025. BitMine Immersion Chair Tom Lee also predicted that the digital asset could hit $60,000, almost 18 times its current value. The equity research firm also argued that Ethereum treasuries have mirrored Strategy‚Äôs model, which shifted its focus from software development to purchasing Bitcoin in 2020. The firm now holds around $72 billion in BTC, but Bernstein believes ETH treasuries could have a more involved risk management strategy compared to Strategy‚Äôs model. DAOs face centralization risks The brokerage company cautioned that Ethereum treasuries also face centralization risks, particularly in governance token distribution and control. The firm argued that treasury platforms such as Karpatkey, Llama, and Avantgarde are controlled by core contributors, which raises concerns over accountability due to the large sums of public capital they manage. According to the firm, DAO‚Äôs internal legal framework makes it hard to identify the responsible party for asset mismanagement. The equity research company believes that, as much as treasury protocols offer undisputed composability, there‚Äôs a void in scaling in a decentralized and compliant manner. Bernstein acknowledged that ETH treasuries are unregulated asset managers, warning that a lack of a clear legal framework would expose them to enforcement action or internal governance breakdowns. The brokerage firm still believes the treasuries will grow as DAOs adapt to financing parameters. The company also hopes that the category will mature as the regulatory environment begins to incorporate clearer standards for decentralized entities. Bernstein forecasts a $1 billion ETH treasure could garner around $30-$50 million in annual returns from staking and yield strategies. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? HEADLINE: Coinbase on an Acquisition Spree! Will It Acquire the Cryptocurrency Exchange That Suffered a Major Hack Attack in the Past Weeks? First Announcement Released!
SUMMARY: Coinbase, the largest US cryptocurrency exchange, is in talks to acquire India-based exchange CoinDCX at a valuation of approximately $1 billion, according to Indian media outlet Livemint. CoinDCX''s valuation has fallen below $1 billion from a peak of $2.2 billion following a $44 million attack targeting its operational hot wallet nearly two weeks ago. CoinDCX, which once had over 10 million users and 1,000 employees, struggled to recover from the incident. The sources stated that this deal reflects Coinbase‚Äôs strategic move into India‚Äôs rapidly growing digital asset market and sees it as a long-term investment in the Indian market. While Coinbase CoinDCX talks continue to be discussed, the first comment came from CoinDCX CEO Sumit Gupta. The CoinDCX CEO denied that his company was in talks to be acquired by Coinbase for approximately $1 billion. ‚ÄúI just saw the news! Don''t listen to the rumours! CoinDCX is hyper-focused on building India''s cryptocurrency story and is not for sale! I''ll share more later, but I wanted to clarify this upfront!‚Äù While Gupta has denied any talks of acquiring Coinbase CoinDCX, Coinbase appears to be on a buying spree, having acquired Deribit for $2.9 billion in May as part of its bid to become a leader in the crypto derivatives market. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Coinbase on an Acquisition Spree! Will It Acquire the Cryptocurrency Exchange That Suffered a Major Hack Attack in the Past Weeks? First Announcement Released!

While Coinbase CoinDCX talks continue to be discussed, the first comment came from CoinDCX CEO Sumit Gupta. The CoinDCX CEO denied that his company was in talks to be acquired by Coinbase for approximately $1 billion. ‚ÄúI just saw the news! Don''t listen to the rumours! CoinDCX is hyper-focused on building India''s cryptocurrency story and is not for sale! I''ll share more later, but I wanted to clarify this upfront!‚Äù While Gupta has denied any talks of acquiring Coinbase CoinDCX, Coinbase appears to be on a buying spree, having acquired Deribit for $2.9 billion in May as part of its bid to become a leader in the crypto derivatives market. *This is not investment advice. HEADLINE: Coinbase Premium Turns Negative! Is U.S. Demand for Bitcoin Collapsing?
SUMMARY: The post Coinbase Premium Turns Negative! Is U.S. Demand for Bitcoin Collapsing? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The cryptocurrency market is on high alert today after new data from CryptoQuant shows that the Coinbase Premium Gap for Bitcoin has turned negative for the first time in two months. This important metric may be signaling that buying demand in the United States is growing weaker, which could put more pressure on Bitcoin in the short term. Coinbase‚Äôs Bitcoin Premium Turns Negative For the past 60 days, Bitcoin has been trading at a higher price on Coinbase compared to Binance. This usually signals strong buying interest from U.S.-based investors, especially big institutions. Coinbase is preferred in the U.S. due to its regulatory trust and cleaner reputation. But now, for the first time since late May, this premium has flipped. Bitcoin is cheaper on Coinbase than on Binance. Meanwhile, this flip suggests that U.S. demand has slowed down, especially from big institutions that usually use Coinbase to trade. If this trend continues, Bitcoin might drop further. Analysts believe prices could retest support levels between $118,000 and $116,000 CryptoQuant: Weak U.S. Demand Could Pressure Prices Experts at CryptoQuant warn that this drop in U.S. interest might lead to short-term price pressure. In the past, similar negative shifts were linked to U.S. traders becoming cautious. Adding to this concern, Bitcoin ETF inflows have also slowed down in recent weeks, further showing that investor interest from the U.S. might be cooling off, at least for now. Ethereum Coinbase Premium Turn Neutral On the other hand, CryptoQuant‚Äôs data also highlights that the Ethereum Coinbase Premium Gap is now neutral, which also means US investors are no longer eager buyers. The shift indicator shows that the Ethereum price will slide toward $3,750 to $3,800. But if the premium gap turns positive again soon, it could be a sign that US buyers are returning, which might help push prices back up. As of now, Ethereum is trading around $3,874 , reflecting a slight drop seen in the last 24 hours.

HEADLINE: A Matter Of Time? US May Start Buying Bitcoin Soon, Says Anthony Pompliano
SUMMARY: On Monday, Anthony Pompliano, founder and CEO of Professional Capital Management, discussed the state of the crypto market, Wall Street‚Äôs growing interest and adoption of Bitcoin (BTC), and some of the events to look forward to. Wall Street‚Äôs Eyes On Bitcoin In an interview with CNBC‚Äôs Squawk Box, Anthony Pompliano praised the flagship cryptocurrency, affirming that Bitcoin has established itself as the ‚Äúking of the market,‚Äù which won‚Äôt change anytime soon. The CEO asserted that most of Wall Street‚Äôs time and attention is on BTC, as it has ‚Äúkind of broken away,‚Äù while other assets, like Ethereum, have yet to set a new all-time high (ATH) this cycle. He explained that BTC‚Äôs current leading status ‚Äúdoesn‚Äôt mean that some of these other assets, maybe, in the future, can‚Äôt do that,‚Äù but noted that BTC continues to dominate the market in market capitalization, capital flow, and attention. Pompliano highlighted that over the past five to seven years, BTC has gone from ‚Äúa contrarian trade to a consensus trade,‚Äù where everyone is convinced that the leading cryptocurrency will be ‚Äúaround for a long time.‚Äù Therefore, ‚ÄúWall Street, who really was kind of ignoring it or trying to stiff-arm Bitcoin, has now said, wait a second, let‚Äôs open up the doors and let‚Äôs embrace this thing because they figured out how to make money.‚Äù He noted that the flagship crypto has been ‚Äúput into Wall Street wrappers,‚Äù like spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs), public companies, and real estate funds, which is a trend that will likely continue in the future as it will bring more customers and more profits for these institutions. I think you‚Äôre going to continue to see Wall Street take Bitcoin and put it in every single corner of the traditional financial system, because ultimately, Bitcoin brings volatility. Bitcoin brings financial return in a way that they‚Äôre not used to seeing. BTC‚Äôs Next Big Thing When asked about the ‚Äúnext big thing‚Äù for Bitcoin, Pompliano stated that there are some key factors that people will be paying attention to in the future. One of them will be the US government‚Äôs potential announcement of a BTC purchase. ‚ÄúThe United States government at some point is going to announce that they‚Äôre buying bitcoin,‚Äù he affirmed. The CEO explained that creating the initial Strategic BTC Reserve (SBR) with the assets that the government already had ‚Äúwas good,‚Äù but was never ‚Äúthe main dish.‚Äù To him, ‚Äúthe main dish‚Äù will be the US government buying BTC, which he thinks ‚Äúwill happen at some point.‚Äù Notably, US President Donald Trump signed an executive order on March 6 to officially create a Strategic BTC Reserve and a Digital Asset Stockpile, funded by crypto seized from government criminal and civil forfeiture proceedings. Since then, the government has been exploring ‚Äúbudget-neutral‚Äù mechanisms to acquire the flagship crypto. In March, Republican Senator Cynthia Lummis reintroduced the Boosting Innovation, Technology, and Competitiveness through Optimized Investment Nationwide (BITCOIN) Act, originally introduced on July 31, 2024, to establish ‚Äúa strategic Bitcoin reserve to serve as an additional store of value to bolster America‚Äôs balance sheet and ensure the transparent management of Bitcoin holdings of the federal government.‚Äù The bill aims to implement a BTC Purchase Program to buy around 5% of the total BTC supply, or 1 million BTC, over 5 years, mirroring the ‚Äúsize and scope‚Äù of the US gold reserves. The legislation proposes a hold period of at least 20 years for the BTC acquired under the purchase program. Pompliano also named Wall Street‚Äôs ‚Äúwhite flag‚Äù moment as another event that investors will look forward to. He forecasted that one of the things we are ‚Äúgoing to see is some of the last standing people on Wall Street capitulate,‚Äù with a couple of firms continuing to say that BTC is speculative, before they ‚Äúeventually give up and wave the white flag,‚Äù he concluded.
TAGS: Crypto News|Anthony Pompliano|bitcoin|BITCOIN Act|bitcoin ETFs|Bitcoin Reserve Asset Trump|btc|BTCUSDT|Crypto Market|Digital Asset Stockpile|US President Donald Trump|US Strageic Bitcoin Reserve|wall street bitcoin
